original_title: 刑期を終えた強姦魔が10年ぶりに女を犯した日。 三宮つばき
overview: It's been a long time... I was sentenced to 10 years for severe injury and strong obscenity. And today, he was released from prison after completing his sentence. When I was a child, I was abused by my mother, and I completely developed my propensity. The first experience was when I was a student, and the opponent was a childhood friend in the neighborhood. I was beaten by his mother that day, and I forced my childhood friend who was always kind to me. Conquering a woman makes me extraordinarily excited.
title: The day a convicted rapist who has served his sentence fucks a woman for the first time in 10 years. Tsubaki Sannomiya
